oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Corporal Lorenzo Dow Atwood
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Corporal Lorenzo Dow Atwood of Co. D., 43rd Wisc. Infantry Regiment, USA writing from Johnsonville, Tennessee to "Cordelia, Leona, and Art". Letter includes a small drawing of the Johnsonville site including location of barracks, picket line, railroad to Nashville, and the Tennessee River. He describes their position and discusses "Shermans supplies".
